pr_title: chore(ci): improve integration test retry logic

timeline.message: ci: improve integration test retry logic

timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: This change increases it from the default of 5 seconds to 20 seconds, and it actually is the difference in getting the tests to pass on CircleCI!   It passes every time locally with a 5 second timeout, but for some reason takes longer on CircleCI.
replies.author: richardmcclellan
